verses.roman:
caitanya-prabhute tāṅra sudṛḍha viśvāsa
nityānanda-prati tāṅra viśvāsa-ābhāsa

synonyms: caitanya-prabhute—unto Lord Caitanya; tāṅra—his; su-dṛḍha—fixed; viśvāsa—faith; nityānanda-prati—unto Lord Nityānanda; tāṅra—his; viśvāsa-ābhāsa—dim reflection of faith.
translation: My brother had firm faith in Lord Caitanya but only a dim glimmer of faith in Lord Nityānanda.
